flow.header: Follow our guide to pair your Amazon account with 2FAS app.

menu.title: Please select the method you use to open Amazon right now

steps.content: Go to www.amazon.com and log into your account.

Find 'Login & security' option.

- On desktop in Account & Lists option.
- On mobile click 'Person' icon, then 'See All' in Your Account.
Confirm the e-mail sent to verify your identity.
Click 'Get Started' and then select 'Authenticator App'.
Scan the QR code and enter the generated code from the 2FAS app to Amazon account
In the Amazon app, tap the 'Account icon' at the bottom of the page.
Select 'Your account' and then tap 'Login & security' under 'Account settings'.
You may be asked for your password for security reasons
Confirm the e-mail sent to validate the action.
Click 'Get Started' and then select 'Authenticator App'.
Follow the instructions in the Amazon App and copy the code from Step 3. When ready, proceed to the next step and paste the code in the 'Secret Key' field.
